style.background-color: =if(@currentField == '1. Excellent', '#00B050',if(@currentField == '2. Good', '#92D050',if(@currentField == '3. Satisfactory', '#FFC000',if(@currentField == '4. Improvement Needed', '#FF6600',if(@currentField == '5. Unsatisfactory', '#FF0000',if(@currentField == '6. Deficient', '#C00000','#C00000'))))))
